analysis.key_quote: I vehemently oppose OPM-2025-0004, and the idea of our civil servants having to pledge loyalty to one political party - and it is immaterial which party is being referred to - is one of the most anti-American things I can think of.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and raises concerns about the politicization of civil service, indicating a strong belief in nonpartisan governance and the integrity of democratic institutions.
